author: Haldanite
title: Simply Amazing
review: This model is as the review title says, simply amazing.  This thing looks so good and I'm not even a fan of fire engines.  It is large, about the same size as many of my Technic cars (just not as many parts).  After building it I had it out in the kitchen and from a little distance away it was hard to tell that it was built from Lego if you didn't know that it was.  It is a great design for a nice show piece in my collection.  I'm happy that I decided to go in on the preorder.
